# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  tags vcvs.cir vcvs_trans.cir DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} vcvs.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vcvs.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vcvs.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VCVS/vcvs.cir.prn vcvs.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vcvs.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY} vcvs.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vcvs.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vcvs.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VCVS/vcvs.cir.prn vcvs.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vcvs.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} vcvs_trans.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vcvs_trans.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vcvs_trans.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.prn vcvs_trans.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vcvs_trans.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY} vcvs_trans.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vcvs_trans.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vcvs_trans.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.prn vcvs_trans.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vcvs_trans.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VCVS/vcvs_trans.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;vcvs;valgrind")
endif()
